resources.string: visoka učilišta, menze, knjižnjice i čitaonice, domovi...
If you will be staying in dorms you need to do regular medical sheck up and bring the doctors document with yourself.

Upon the arrival, you need to fo to the police station where you will get residence permits.

 In order to get a residents permit, you need to have:
 1. invitation letter
 2. copy of ID card or passport
 3. European health insurance card
 4. confirmation of Erasmus scholarship from your institution or a bank statement showing enough funds for living expenses
 5. confirmation of accommodation (if you are staying in dorms you will get the card when checked in or if you find different kind of accommodation you should ask your landlords for the confirmation of accommodation).

 Once you have your residence permit, you need to go to the tax office in order to obtain ID number (OIB or PIN).

 After you will get your PIN you should bring it to Erasmus administrator on the institution of higher education that you are staying at.

Tomislav Šebalj

We would like to help all the students on Erasmus scholarship in Zagreb to better use the time they have to visit all the locations student are usually interested in, such as dormitories, restaurants that give student discounts, Colleges, Embassies, movie theaters and lots more.
